dataList.dlg: My name's Hong Lu. I hope we can get along well.
Good morning, Dante! My resident chef taught me that truffles are wonderful for relieving the morning fatigue~
An interesting thing I noted here is that I was able to learn how it feels to be hungry. What a curious sensation that was.
The evening has its own beauty. Although the view isn't as clear as my room's window... It's still nice that you're here with me.
When I go back home later, I'd love to invite you to a fabulous party. I'll introduce my new friends to Father, too... It's gonna be a fun time.
When you're distraught, simply remember that life goes on even if what you're doing doesn't work out, and you'll be free of worries.
A family... I heard a family is like a sanctuary offering each other shelter, right? I thought it was a cohort of kin looking to stab each other in the back at every turn all my life~
Oh? Has an urgent matter arisen, Dante? Take your time~
Golly, I can't wait~
I hope something fun happens~
What is it, Dante?
I'll do what I can~ If it flunks, it flunks~
Haha. What an amusing moment~
Oh my!
I never run out of new sights to see~
Oh dear, does it hurt a lot? Please tell me later.
Ahaha, there’s no need to shower me with praise.
Oh dear~ Don’t blame yourself too much. It just wasn’t your day.
Oh... Is this thanks to me, perhaps? Anyway, it's nice to hear that we've won~
No need to shower me with compliments~ I'm sure you had a part in it, too.
It is what it is, wouldn't you agree? Don't be so down~
